text: Elin Gunhild "Gullan" Bornemark (born Bohlin; 28 November 1927 in Härnösand, Sweden) is a Swedish musician, lyricist and composer. Between 1951 and 2007, she was also active as a music teacher. ==Famous songs== *Herr Gårman *Lillebror (1964) *Min ponny *Sudda sudda *Är du vaken Lars? *Skojiga valpen (also known as "Valpen min") == References == Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century composers Category:21st-century composers Category:Swedish songwriters Category:Swedish musicians Category:Teachers
title: Gullan Bornemark
